The data can be read only via DownloadFileWritableChannel, + * which ensures data is not read until after the writer is closed. + */ +public interface DownloadFile { + /** + * Delete the file. + * + * @return true if and only if the file or directory is + * successfully deleted; false otherwise + */ + public boolean delete(); + + /** + * A channel for writing data to the file.
